Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-10979 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 16.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-10979 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 16.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postgresql is earlier than 16.5-1, affected by CVE-2024-10979
